title: 2008–09 KNVB Cup
text:
The 2008–09 <a href="KNVB%20Cup">KNVB Cup</a> was the 91st season of the <a href="Netherlands">Dutch</a> national <a href="Association%20football">football</a> knockout tournament. The defending champions were <a href="Feyenoord">Feyenoord</a>. The competition started on 30 August 2008 and ended with <a href="sc%20Heerenveen">sc Heerenveen</a> winning the Final in <a href="Rotterdam">Rotterdam</a> on 17 May 2009.
Clubs.
Participating clubs in the 2008–09 KNVB Cup by province:
Results.
The first and second round draw was made on July 8, 2008 in <a href="Zeist">Zeist</a>, <a href="Royal%20Dutch%20Football%20Association">KNVB</a> headquarters.
First round.
The First Round featured 48 amateur teams: 35 <a href="Hoofdklasse">Hoofdklasse</a> clubs, 12 clubs from the 4th or lower levels and 2 reserve teams. 24 of the <a href="Hoofdklasse">Hoofdklasse</a> clubs qualified for the competition through their league performance during the <a href="Hoofdklasse%202007-08">previous season</a> (top 4 of each <a href="Hoofdklasse">Hoofdklasse</a>), while the other half of the teams competing in the First Round secured their place through the 2007–08 <a href="KNVB%20District%20Cup">KNVB District Cup</a>s. The matches were played on August 30 and 31, 2008.
Second round.
The 24 winners from the First Round, together with 2 youth teams (winners of youth league and cup) and all clubs from both the <a href="Eredivisie%202008-09">Eredivisie</a> and the <a href="Eerste%20Divisie%202008-09">Eerste Divisie</a> qualified for the Second Round. The matches were played on September 23, 24 and 25, 2008.
Participants:
Third round.
The winners the Second Round matches progressed to the Third Round. The matches were played on November 11, 12 and 13, 2008.
Participants:
Fourth round.
The Fourth Round was played on January 20, 21 and 28, 2009. With Feyenoord losing to Heerenveen 3-0, it marked the first time in 27 years and the third time ever in the KNVB Cup where any of the Big Three teams failed to reach the quarter-finals of the tournament.
